pullrequest.title: Fix circular dependency between physics and sensors (issue #1516)

content.raw:
This is most important on Ubuntu 15.10 (wily) which currently fails:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-default-wily-amd64-gpu-none/16/

We don't have an `-any` jenkins job for wily. Is that hard to make @\_jrivero_ ?
content.html:
This is most important on Ubuntu 15.10 (wily) which currently fails:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-default-wily-amd64-gpu-none/16/

We don't have an -any jenkins job for wily. Is that hard to make @_jrivero_ ?
